About


Who am I?

My name is Navid Madani. I have received my BSc. in computer engineering at the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Tehran . Currently a PhD student at University at Buffalo in Computer Science with a focus on building explainable and factual dialogue systems. Former Machine Learning Engineer at Tapsi Co.. Overall, I am deeply passionate about exploring the potential of NLP to create intelligent systems that can reason over external and factual knowledge sources.

Education

    • Natural Language Processing with a focus on dialogue(conversational) models
  • University of Tehran , B.Sc. , Computer Engineering -Software
    • Cumulative GPA 3.70/4 (17.28/20)
